start.text: All stations, this is the Captain. Set General Quarters. Commence combat operations.
TAO reports weapons hot, systems green. Ready to engage on your order.
Battle stations manned and ready. Standing by for weapons release.
Ship is at General Quarters, combat systems fully operational. Awaiting your command.
All stations report ready for action. Combat watch closed up.

start_boss.text: High-value target designated ALPHA. All weapons train on that contact. Priority engagement.
Capital ship contact bearing, classified high-threat. Weapons tight until PID confirmed.
Flag-level hostile confirmed. Bringing the full broadside to bear.
That's the primary threat. All batteries, this is our fight.

engaged.text: Weapons free, weapons free. Engaging hostile contacts.
Batteries released. Commence fire, commence fire.
Range closing. Opening fire with all available weapons.
Positive ID, hostile. You are cleared hot. Shoot.

pursuing.text: Target is running. Pursuing at flank speed, maintain firing solution.
Hostile attempting to break contact. Negative, closing to knife-fight range.
Pursuit course. Do not let them disengage.
They're turning away. Press the attack, keep them in the envelope.

running.text: Executing tactical withdrawal. Screening units cover our pullout.
Combat effectiveness reduced. Disengaging per doctrine.
We're taking heavy fire. Break contact, reform at rally point.
Captain orders tactical retrograde. All units acknowledge withdrawal.

hull_90.text: Minor hull hit, port quarter. Damage negligible, continuing the engagement.
Took a round, armor held. No impact on combat capability.
Light damage forward. DC parties respond, maintain fire.
Hit confirmed, superficial. Weapons and propulsion nominal.

hull_50.text: Hull integrity fifty percent. We're hurt but still in the fight.
Multiple hits amidships. Damage control, prioritize magazines and VLS.
Heavy damage. Requesting screening support to remain engaged.
Fifty percent structure remaining. Guns still answering bells.
Significant structural damage. Continuing offensive operations.

hull_30.text: Critical hull damage! Multiple frames failing. Prepare to abandon ship if ordered!
Losing integrity fast! All damage control parties, maximum effort!
Hull failing in multiple sections! Brace for impact, brace!
We're coming apart! All hands to escape pods, stand by!
Hull failing - We're coming apart! Be ready to abandon ship!

need_help.text: Any unit this net, this is $shipNameNoPrefix, heavily engaged, multiple hostiles, require immediate assistance.
Taking heavy fire from multiple vectors. Request relief force now.
This is $shipNameNoPrefix, under concentrated fire, need support at this time.
We are in contact, outnumbered. Any friendly unit, vector to my position.

retreat.text: All units, execute immediate withdrawal to phase line Delta. Acknowledge.
Break contact. Tactical withdrawal, cover each other.
Fleet order: disengage and reform. Cease fire, maximize distance.
We're pulling out. Screen the withdrawal, then follow.

out_of_missiles.text: VLS cells empty. Switching to five-inch and energy batteries.
Missile expenditure complete. Continuing with guns, close the range.
Ordnance expended. Transitioning to gun engagement.
No missiles remaining. Going to knives.

overload.text: Flux critical! Emergency vent  -  weapons temporarily offline!
Overload cascade! Forced vent in three… two…
Capacitors spiking  -  dropping shields to vent!
Flux overload! All hands brace for vent!

death.text: Reactor criticality… abandon ship… abandon ship…
She's breaking up… give 'em hell for us…
This is $shipNameNoPrefix… we are lost… avenge us…
Core breach… it's been an honor serving with you…
Catastrophic damage! Reactor scram, abandon ship, abandon ship!

victory.text: Hostiles destroyed. Secure from general quarters.
Battlespace is ours. Standing by for further orders.
Enemy force neutralized. Resume patrol posture.

victory_boss.text: High-value target destroyed. Major objective complete.
Capital ship kill confirmed. Damn fine shooting.
Primary threat eliminated. Log that one for the wardroom tonight.
Flag-level hostile sunk. The fleet owes this crew.
